titles: Several conferences between a Romish priest, a fanatick chaplain, and a divine of the Church of England concerning the idolatry of the Church of Rome, being a full answer to the late dialogues of T.G.
author: Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699.
publisher: Printed by M.W. for H. Mortlock ...,
notes: Attributed to Edward Stillingfleet. cf. BM.
T.G. is Thomas Godden. cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
keywords: Idols and images --  Worship --  Early works to 1800.
